text: Ej kasone, ki ʙa Alloh imon ovardaed, az Alloh ʙitarsed ʙo ʙa co ovardani amrhojas va dur ʙudan az man'kardahojas va ʙa pajomʙaras imon ʙijovared, to sumoro az rahmati xes du ʙaroʙar muzd ʙidihad. Va sumoro nure ato kunad, to ʙa on roh raved va ʙaroi sumo gunohonatonro meomurzad. Va Alloh ʙo ʙandagonas omurzandavu mehruʙon ast
